fd:scripts.fd:click: [{"script":{"field":"guide.guideRootPanel.mainPanel.dashboard.newDisputeMeeting"\,"event":"Click"\,"model":{"nodeName":"EVENT_SCRIPTS"}\,"content":"//newDisputeMeetingrequest.visible = true;\\n//mainPanel.visible = false;\\n//fetch dispute details from ea and district\\nvar params = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search);\\nvar actualData=JSON.parse(window.atob(params.get('input')));\\n//console.log(actualData);\\n//console.log(\\"hh\\")\\nvar jsonData = {\\n \\"contractKey\\" : actualData.contract_number\\n}; \\n//console.log(jsonData);\\nvar dollarUSLocale12 = Intl.NumberFormat('en-US');\\n$.ajax({ \\n type: 'GET'\, \\n data: jsonData\,\\n url: 'http://'+window.location.hostname+':8080/rest/services/Caltrans-eADR/Processes/GetTotalPCPDetails'\,\\n success: function (data) { \\n //console.log(data);\\n \\t data=JSON.parse(data);\\n if(typeof(data.PCP_Details.Record.PCP_MAIN_PK)===\\"undefined\\"){\\n \\tcount1=data.PCP_Details.Record.length;\\n }\\n else{\\n count1=1;\\n }\\n \\t if(count1===1){\\n tablenewDisputeRow1.instanceManager.addInstance(1);\\n tablenewDisputeRow1.instanceManager.instances[0].PCRNoNew.value=data.PCP_Details.Record.PCP_MAIN_PK;\\n if(data.PCP_Details.Record.D_IPC_DESCR!==\\"null\\"){\\n tablenewDisputeRow1.instanceManager.instances[0].DescNew.value=data.PCP_Details.Record.D_IPC_DESCR;\\n }\\n if(data.PCP_Details.Record.E_EST_COST!==\\"null\\"){\\n tablenewDisputeRow1.instanceManager.instances[0].DollarNew.value=\\"$ \\"+dollarUSLocale12.format(data.PCP_Details.Record.E_EST_COST);\\n }\\n if(data.PCP_Details.Record.E_TIME_IMPACT!==\\"null\\"){\\n tablenewDisputeRow1.instanceManager.instances[0].DelayDaysNew.value=data.PCP_Details.Record.E_TIME_IMPACT;\\n }\\n if(data.PCP_Details.Record.E_REC_DATE!==\\"null\\"){\\n tablenewDisputeRow1.instanceManager.instances[0].DateSuppNew.value=data.PCP_Details.Record.E_REC_DATE;\\n }\\n tablenewDisputeRow1.instanceManager.instances[0].visible=true;\\n }\\n else{\\n \\tfor(var i=0; i<data.PCP_Details.Record.length; i++){\\n tablenewDispute.tablenewDisputeRow1.instanceManager.addInstance(1);\\n //alert(data.PCP_Details.Record[i].PCP_MAIN_PK);\\n tablenewDispute.tablenewDisputeRow1.instanceManager.instances[i].PCRNoNew.value=data.PCP_Details.Record[i].PCP_MAIN_PK;\\n if(data.PCP_Details.Record[i].D_IPC_DESCR!==\\"null\\"){\\n tablenewDisputeRow1.instanceManager.instances[i].DescNew.value=data.PCP_Details.Record[i].D_IPC_DESCR;\\n }\\n if(data.PCP_Details.Record[i].E_EST_COST!==\\"null\\"){\\n tablenewDisputeRow1.instanceManager.instances[i].DollarNew.value=\\"$ \\"+dollarUSLocale12.format(data.PCP_Details.Record[i].E_EST_COST);\\n }\\n if(data.PCP_Details.Record[i].E_TIME_IMPACT!==\\"null\\"){\\n tablenewDisputeRow1.instanceManager.instances[i].DelayDaysNew.value=data.PCP_Details.Record[i].E_TIME_IMPACT;\\n }\\n if(data.PCP_Details.Record[i].E_REC_DATE!==\\"null\\"){\\n tablenewDisputeRow1.instanceManager.instances[i].DateSuppNew.value=data.PCP_Details.Record[i].E_REC_DATE;\\n }\\n tablenewDisputeRow1.instanceManager.instances[i].visible=true;\\n }\\n }\\n newDisputeMeetingrequest.visible = true;\\n\\tmainPanel.visible = false;\\n }\,\\n \\terror: function(err){\\n \\n\\t}\\n});"}\,"nodeName":"SCRIPTMODEL"\,"version":1\,"enabled":true}]

fd:scripts.fd:click: [{"script":{"field":"guide.guideRootPanel.mainPanel.dashboard.disputeMeeting.buttons.SubmitDueMeetDateButton"\,"event":"Click"\,"model":{"nodeName":"EVENT_SCRIPTS"}\,"content":"//alert(tablenewDispute.tablenewDisputeRow1.instanceManager.instanceCount);\\nvar meetingType\,disputeID;\\nfor(var i=0;i < DisputeDashDisTable.Row1.instanceManager.instanceCount-1;i++){\\n\\tif(DisputeDashDisTable.Row1.instanceManager.instances[i].tableItem11.value==='Y'){\\n\\t meetingType = DisputeDashDisTable.Row1.instanceManager.instances[i].table1_item3.value;\\n\\t disputeID = DisputeDashDisTable.Row1.instanceManager.instances[i].table1_item1.value;\\n\\t break;\\n\\t}\\n}\\nvar jsonData = {\\n\\t\\"ea\\" : ea.value\,\\n\\t\\"district\\" : district.value\,\\n\\t\\"DisputeID\\" : disputeID\,\\n\\t\\"MeetingType\\" : meetingType\,\\n\\t\\"DRType\\" : SelectDRADRB.value\\n}; \\n\\n//console.log(jsonData);\\n\\n$.ajax({ \\n type: 'GET'\, \\n data: jsonData\,\\n url: 'http://'+window.location.hostname+':8080/rest/services/Caltrans-eADR/Processes/GetNewDisputeCreatedDate'\,\\n success: function (data) { \\n //console.log(data);\\n panelduedate.visible = true;\\n NotifyAllDatesButton.visible=true;\\n UpdateMeetPosDates.visible=false;\\n mainPanel.visible = false;\\n DisputeCreatedDatePM.value=data.getElementsByTagName(\\"DisputeCreatedDate\\")[0].innerHTML;\\n SuccDates.visible = false;\\n ErrorDates.visible = false;\\n }\,\\n \\terror: function(err){\\n \\n\\t}\\n});"}\,"nodeName":"SCRIPTMODEL"\,"version":1\,"enabled":true}]

fd:scripts.fd:click: [{"script":{"field":"guide.guideRootPanel.mainPanel.dashboard.disputeMeeting.buttons.RescheduleDisputeMeet"\,"event":"Click"\,"model":{"nodeName":"EVENT_SCRIPTS"}\,"content":"//alert(tablenewDispute.tablenewDisputeRow1.instanceManager.instanceCount);\\nvar meetingType\,disputeID;\\nfor(var i=0;i < DisputeDashDisTable.Row1.instanceManager.instanceCount-1;i++){\\n\\tif(DisputeDashDisTable.Row1.instanceManager.instances[i].tableItem11.value==='Y'){\\n\\t meetingType = DisputeDashDisTable.Row1.instanceManager.instances[i].table1_item3.value;\\n\\t disputeID = DisputeDashDisTable.Row1.instanceManager.instances[i].table1_item1.value;\\n\\t break;\\n\\t}\\n}\\nvar jsonData = {\\n\\t\\"ea\\" : ea.value\,\\n\\t\\"district\\" : district.value\,\\n\\t\\"DisputeID\\" : disputeID\,\\n\\t\\"MeetingType\\" : meetingType\,\\n\\t\\"DRType\\" : SelectDRADRB.value\\n}; \\n\\n//console.log(jsonData);\\n\\n$.ajax({ \\n type: 'GET'\, \\n data: jsonData\,\\n url: 'http://'+window.location.hostname+':8080/rest/services/Caltrans-eADR/Processes/GetNewDisputeCreatedDate'\,\\n success: function (data) { \\n //console.log(data);\\n panelduedate.visible = true;\\n NotifyAllDatesButton.visible=false;\\n UpdateMeetPosDates.visible=true;\\n mainPanel.visible = false;\\n DisputeCreatedDatePM.value=data.getElementsByTagName(\\"DisputeCreatedDate\\")[0].innerHTML;\\n if(data.getElementsByTagName(\\"PosDueDate\\")[0].innerHTML===\\"null\\" || data.getElementsByTagName(\\"PosDueDate\\")[0].innerHTML===\\"\\"){\\n \\n }\\n else{\\n PosPaperDueDateDash.value=data.getElementsByTagName(\\"PosDueDate\\")[0].innerHTML;\\n }\\n if(data.getElementsByTagName(\\"MeetDate\\")[0].innerHTML===\\"null\\" || data.getElementsByTagName(\\"MeetDate\\")[0].innerHTML===\\"\\"){\\n \\n }\\n else{\\n MeetDateDash.value=data.getElementsByTagName(\\"MeetDate\\")[0].innerHTML;\\n }\\n SuccDates.visible = false;\\n ErrorDates.visible = false;\\n }\,\\n \\terror: function(err){\\n \\n\\t}\\n});"}\,"nodeName":"SCRIPTMODEL"\,"version":1\,"enabled":true}]

fd:scripts.fd:init: [{"script":{"content":"//fetch dispute details from ea and district\\nvar params = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search);\\nvar actualData=JSON.parse(window.atob(params.get('input')));\\n//console.log(actualData);\\nea.value=actualData.ea;\\ndistrict.value=actualData.district;\\nvar jsonData={'ea':ea.value\,'district':district.value\,'InfoType':'Complete'};\\n//console.log(jsonData);\\n$.ajax({ \\n type: 'GET'\, \\n contentType: 'application/xml'\, \\n url: 'http://'+window.location.hostname+':8080'+'/rest/services/Caltrans-eADR/Processes/GetDisputeMeetings'\,\\n data: jsonData\,\\n success: function (data) { \\n //console.log(data.getElementsByTagName(\\"GetRowCount\\")[0].innerHTML);\\n count=parseInt(data.getElementsByTagName(\\"GetRowCount\\")[0].innerHTML);\\n if(count>0){\\n jsonResponse = JSON.parse(data.getElementsByTagName(\\"DRBMembersDetailsJson\\")[0].innerHTML);\\n // console.log(jsonResponse.Dispute_Meetings);\\n //console.log(data.Dispute_Meetings.Meeting.length);\\n if(count===1){\\n //console.log(table1.Row1.instanceManager.instances);\\n DisputeDashDisTable.Row1.instanceManager.addInstance(1);\\n //tableItem11.value=data[i].Select;\\n DisputeDashDisTable.Row1.instanceManager.instances[0].table1_item1.value=jsonResponse.Dispute_Meetings.Meeting.DISPUTE_MEETING_ID;\\n DisputeDashDisTable.Row1.instanceManager.instances[0].table1_item2.value=jsonResponse.Dispute_Meetings.Meeting.OVERALL_STATUS;\\n DisputeDashDisTable.Row1.instanceManager.instances[0].table1_item3.value=jsonResponse.Dispute_Meetings.Meeting.TYPE_OF_MEETING;\\n DisputeDashDisTable.Row1.instanceManager.instances[0].table1_item4.value=jsonResponse.Dispute_Meetings.Meeting.POSITION_PAPER_DUEDATE;\\n DisputeDashDisTable.Row1.instanceManager.instances[0].table1_item5.value=jsonResponse.Dispute_Meetings.Meeting.MEETING_DATE;\\n DisputeDashDisTable.Row1.instanceManager.instances[0].visible=true;\\n }\\n else{\\n for(var i=0; i<count; i++){ \\n //console.log(table1.Row1.instanceManager.instances);\\n DisputeDashDisTable.Row1.instanceManager.addInstance(1);\\n //tableItem11.value=data[i].Select;\\n DisputeDashDisTable.Row1.instanceManager.instances[i].table1_item1.value=jsonResponse.Dispute_Meetings.Meeting[i].DISPUTE_MEETING_ID;\\n DisputeDashDisTable.Row1.instanceManager.instances[i].table1_item2.value=jsonResponse.Dispute_Meetings.Meeting[i].OVERALL_STATUS;\\n DisputeDashDisTable.Row1.instanceManager.instances[i].table1_item3.value=jsonResponse.Dispute_Meetings.Meeting[i].TYPE_OF_MEETING; \\t\\t\\t\\t\\t\\t DisputeDashDisTable.Row1.instanceManager.instances[i].table1_item4.value=jsonResponse.Dispute_Meetings.Meeting[i].POSITION_PAPER_DUEDATE;\\n DisputeDashDisTable.Row1.instanceManager.instances[i].table1_item5.value=jsonResponse.Dispute_Meetings.Meeting[i].MEETING_DATE; \\n DisputeDashDisTable.Row1.instanceManager.instances[i].visible=true;\\n }\\n //console.log(table1.Row1.instanceManager.instanceCount);\\n }\\n }\\n }\,\\n error: function(err){\\n alert(\\"something went wrong\\");\\n }\\n});"\,"event":"Initialize"\,"field":"guide.guideRootPanel.mainPanel.dashboard.disputeMeeting"}\,"nodeName":"SCRIPTMODEL"\,"version":1\,"enabled":true}]

fd:scripts.fd:click: [{"script":{"content":"var meetingType\,disputeID;\\nvar disList = DisputeDashDisTable.Row1.instanceManager.instances;\\nfor(var i=0;i < DisputeDashDisTable.Row1.instanceManager.instanceCount-1;i++){\\n if(disList[i].tableItem11.value==='Y'){\\n meetingType = disList[i].table1_item3.value;\\n disputeID = disList[i].table1_item1.value;\\n break;\\n }\\n}\\nif(typeof(disputeID)!==\\"undefined\\" || typeof(meetingType)!==\\"undefined\\"){\\n var jsonData = {\\n \\"ea\\" : ea.value\,\\n \\"district\\" : district.value\,\\n \\"UserID\\" : userID.value\,\\n \\"disputeID\\" : disputeID\,\\n \\"MeetingType\\" : meetingType\,\\n \\"DRType\\" : SelectDRADRB.value\,\\n \\"Comments\\":DisputeCloseComments.value\,\\n \\"Reason\\":DisputeReasonDropdown.value\\n }; \\n xmlData = OBJtoXML1({\\"data\\":jsonData});\\n \\t//console.log(xmlData);\\n url = 'http://'+window.location.hostname+':8080/rest/services/Caltrans-eADR/Processes/CloseDisputeMeeting';\\n $.ajax({ \\n type: 'POST'\,\\n headers: {\\n 'Content-Type' : 'application/xml'\,\\n 'Accept' : '*/*'\\n }\,\\n url: url\,\\n data: xmlData\,\\n success: function (data) {\\n //console.log(data);\\n }\,\\n error: function(err){\\n //this block is executed when server encounters any problem\\n ErrorCloseDisputeMssge.visible=true;\\n ErrorCloseDisputeMssge.value=\\"something went wrong\\";\\n }\\n });\\n}\\nelse{\\n alert(\\"Please select dispute ID\\");\\n}"\,"event":"Click"\,"field":"guide.guideRootPanel.mainPanel.dashboard.closeDispute.button1655699134180"}\,"nodeName":"SCRIPTMODEL"\,"version":1\,"enabled":true}]
